verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: Increase verbosity of messages to debug level 6 (error, warn, info)

pageMessage.name: pageMessage
pageMessage.description: Enables the config config.log.page.message to display all messages from the page

tests.name: tests
tests.description: Runs only the given test files or pathes containing test files relative defined to config.pathTests.

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Defines a regular expression for filtering and overwrites config.log.filter.regexp

filterNot.name: filterNot
filterNot.description: Invert the regular expression for filtering and overwrites config.log.filter.not
